name: Age of Empires
description:
This script will install "Age of Empires I - Gold edition" CD with support for modern resolution.
During install please let all options by default.
This script uses different projects:
DxWnd: https://sourceforge.net/projects/dxwnd/
GNU32 tools: http://gnuwin32.sourceforge.net/
Mplayer: http://www.mplayerhq.hu/design7/news.html
Sox: http://sox.sourceforge.net
Thanks to the people who contributed to play this game in the best conditions.
notes:
- 1.0c update for AOE and 1.0a update for ROR
- Support multilanguage CD install: eng, fra, ger, ita, por, spa.
- You will need the CD only one time during install
- Please report issue concerning this script on my Github page:
https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/

script.custom-name: Age of Empires I - Gold edition - CD

task.description: Installing Age of Empires I Gold edition...
task.name: wineexec

target.title1: Age of Empires - Rise of Rome
target.title2: Age of Empires - Rise of Rome Upatch HD

input_menu.description: Please choose AOE I Gold Edition CD language (do not choose another language other than your CD's one)
